comments.text:
This field was embiggened to fit the space because the alternative was to stick them immediately to the right of the label ("Womens S, M...") which would no longer be visually aligned with the rest of the form elements. Thus, the input is float right and widened to fit the space.

Screenshot to visually illustrate:
https://img.skitch.com/20110309-x361ar8bdhmmsdf875pumk7s5.png

That said, please provide guidance as to how, if at all, you'd like these form fields changed (size, position, etc.).
